sub_title: Team Dynamics Coach: Building safe, resilient high-performing teams.
summary:
I consider myself a keen human observer, a provocateur and a catalyst for change. I am deeply fascinated by the inherent philosophy that drives the actions of people, organisations and communities and few things excite me more than the investigation of human psychology to understand how our subconscious patterns can dictate our actions, decisions and relationships in the world. 

Over the last 20 years I have been fortunate to work with some tremendous teams across a variety of countries, cultures, companies and industries on a variety of strategic programs ranging from communication strategy and culture change initiatives to process and technology enablement projects. As a strategy, project and transition manager, I was responsible for delivering tangible technological and process implementations while fostering the necessary behavioural and organisational changes required for long-term success. Despite my success in these roles, the most gratifying part of my job has always remained my relentless interest in the development of an empowered and resilient workplace with real communication through open dialogue and constructive debate that enables you to harness your natural potential. This pursuit naturally drew me into more human related initiatives and led me to conclude that the most intriguing yet mysterious issues resided within the culture, the patterns and the hidden dynamics between the people within the organisation, for which we have yet not articulated a common language. 

As a team dynamics coach, I give particular focus on relationships and group dynamics with the primary goal of building resilient, creative and high-performing teams. By examining the team's subconscious systemic psychology, understanding the individual personalities and promoting healthy dialogue using non-violent communication, I help lay a foundation of trust, safety and transparency. This foundation is essential for developing a culture of mutual support and collaboration. Complementing individual coaching with systemic exercises and tailored workshops using family and organisational constellations stimulates deep, accelerated transformations leading to a sustained positive change within the team.

I believe that creating a world where we can safely embrace and accept our whole selves, with courage and compassion, is critical for personal and collective growth.I am committed to supporting anyone who contributes to this cause and look forward to continuing to observe, provoke, and catalyse change wherever I can.

www.qualia-quest.nl

projects.title: DSI (Inventory) Attack Program
projects.description:
Leading a medium sized, multi-department program comprising of four individual projects to reduce the inventory in the European DC by the end of FY13. This involves;
•	Maintenance of track momentum and progress according to project plan
•	Issue resolution and escalation
•	Project management assistance where needed
•	Maintaining and organizing the project information and documentation
•	Communication to the OPS LT, Planning MT, stakeholders, project teams and planners

contributors.headline: Team Dynamics Coach: Building safe, resilient high-performing teams.

profile_positions.description:
In my role as a coach, I am actively involved in Rabobank's 'Shape (Y)our Future' program, where I assist managers in exploring their authentic selves and understanding their core motivators. By reinforcing these aspects and promoting alignment, I help them achieve personal fulfilment while also contributing to Rabobank's mission of making a meaningful impact on the world. 

This international program encompasses 200 attendees from various countries, reflecting its global reach and impact. My responsibilities include delivering peer group learning sessions and providing individual coaching to support the participants throughout this nine-month, in-company, global leadership development program.
profile_positions.title: Leadership Development Coach

profile_positions.description:
As a team coach, I primarily work with the co-founders to examine and understand the inherent organizational psychology to help develop a safe, empowered and resilient team that is capable of harnessing their full natural potential. My areas of coaching and consulting include;

•	Co-founder relationship
•	Leadership development
•	Team dynamics
•	Organizational culture development
•	Organizational structure development
•	Performance management structure development
profile_positions.title: Team Shaman

profile_positions.description:
We are all part of countless systems - our families, teams, organizations, communities, societies, nations etc. that exert a powerful invisible force on our lives, yet we understand little about how these systemic forces shape our lives and value structures. In my workshops, I work with groups using ‘systemic constellations’, a powerful technique developed by Bert Hellinger, to uncover subconscious group intelligence regarding hidden systemic patterns and traumas leading to the initiation of a healing process that may lead to deep insights and powerful internal transformations. 

I currently use systemic constellations to hold workshops in the following formats:
• Family Constellations: An investigation into your identity and hidden patterns acquired through inter-generational traumas. 
• Organizational Constellations: An investigation into the culture, conflicts and hidden dynamics within your team and organization. 
• Team Resilience: An investigation into the identity of the teams through the lens of its values, hidden dynamics, strengths and purpose to help create safety and build reliance within the team.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
My primary responsibility as a project manager is the delivery of HTGs (How-to-Guides) and RECs (Recordings) as a training tool for the process experts for testing and delivery of Wave I on the SHAPE+ program - a large technology platform implementation within DHL Finance. My role includes;  

•	Review and alignment on project goals
•	Project planning, management and strategy
•	Organizational (re)structure within the project team
•	Team coaching and management
•	Performance tracking and improvement
•	Budget tracking
•	Stakeholder management

Additionally, as a team consultant, I am also supporting the ITDS PMO team to focus on team resilience through its exploration of the team identity and dynamics using systemic interventions.

profile_positions.title: Business Intelligence Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Lead projects with the Strategy and Business Development team to analyze and improve the efficiency of Nike's European Logistics Center based in Laakdal, Belgium. Gained deep experience in warehousing, logistics and supply chains through building complex simulation models
•	Built a sophisticated yet flexible Simulation Model for each PE (APP, FTWR and EQ) to determine the current capacity and predict any future capacity constraints within the individual PE DCs
•	Developed an Inventory Projection Model for Nike Golf 
•	Created a Capacity Planning Tool to help track and plan the blanks and QTT inventory at the factory and obtain information to place orders when needed.

volunteer_experiences.description: I spend time serving coffee and having conversations with illegal homeless migrants in Amsterdam that come to the Wereldhuis for a warm and dry place to sit, have a warm meal and find some companions with whom they can have a conversation and hopefully feel seen and cared for.
Spend time regularly with a mentally challenged patient
